Recommendations: Regularly updating the syllabi, with inclusion of more references that are of more recent editions is suggested.
Professional subjects should be handled by teachers with graduate degrees in Economics.

Changing the course name from BS Economics to BSBA Economics may be considered. It is only the latter that has a CMO setting the standards for the course. This may hopefully arrest the decline of enrollment in the course.
Aside from thesis writing, On-the-Job Training, Practicum, other work related activities may be included in the curriculum for enhanced learning outcomes.

Participation of industry practitioners and other stake olders in curriculum revision and enrichment to ensure a close match between the students' training and the demands of the jobs they will soon occupy may be considered.
